# ParallelTag.AsString method

Generates a shortened hash representation of the Tag preserving uniqueness and distribution characteristics.

```csharp
public string AsString(int length)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| length | The desired length of the shortened hash. Minimum 5 |

## Return Value

A hexadecimal string representation of the tag, optimized to minimize collisions within the specified length.
